result.eng: I was at an interesting lecture recently.
result.ga: Bhí mé ag léacht shuimiúil le déanaí

result.eng: I fell asleep even though the film was very interesting.
result.ga: Thit mé i mo chodladh cé go raibh an scannán an-suimiúil

result.eng: The professor gave an interesting lecture.

result.ponchtml: Ṫug an t-ollaṁ léaċt ẛuimiúilThe professor gave an interesting lecture.

result.html: Tá na ranganna suimiúilThe classes are interesting.

result.eng: An interesting question was raised in the meeting.

result.eng: The classes are interesting and the teachers are nice.
